enhanced_by.reason: The method clearChangedCache() is invoked to clear cached results whenever the state of the schema changes, ensuring that the cache is updated before any subsequent operations.
The method isCoreChanged() can be used to verify if the core schema has changed, which is directly related to the type change being set.
The method isChanged() can be used to verify if any changes have occurred in the schema, which includes the type change being set.
